com.aventura.tools.vector3d.transform

Class Homothety

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aventura.math.vector.Matrix3
      • com.aventura.tools.vector3d.transform.Homothety

  • public class Homothety
extends Matrix3
    This class is a transformation that represents an homothety having its center at origin O. The translation is formalized by a diagonal matrix. Thus this class extends the class Matrix3.
    Author:
    Olivier BARRY
